summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2008 MERCEDES BENZ C300.  WHENEVER THE CONTACT DRIVES THE VEHICLE AT VARIOUS SPEEDS, THE TIRE INFLATION WARNING INDICATOR APPEARS ON THE INSTRUMENT PANEL, EVEN THOUGH THE TIRES HAVE THE CORRECT TIRE PRESSURE.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER AND THEY STATED THAT THE ILLUMINATION WAS DUE TO THE CHANGE IN TEMPERATURE.  THE CONTACT DID NOT NOTICE ANY DIFFERENCES BEFOREHAND.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 5,200 AND FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 3,800.
